title: What is with these "fake support mains"?
body: What I am talking about are the support mains who are glued to their adc all game and use all their buffs on the adc while not giving a single shit about the rest of the team. I have seen janna players shield the full hp adc instead of a 90 hp bruiser that has ignite on him. Then they go on and talk about how selfless they are. Real support mains assess which teammatr they should protect in every situation, and it changes in the same game.

replies.body: Because supports are damned if they do and damned if they dont. No matter what they do someone on the team will be upset or flame them. If this janna you are talking about would of shield the bruiser and the adc died then they would get flame from the adc. People are just never happy.
Cannot tell if irony is intentional or not.

> [{quoted}](name=Bronze 5 Main,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=PXe0rA6Y,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2017-09-12T20:10:26.103+0000)
>
> Because supports are damned if they do and damned if they dont. No matter what they do someone on the team will be upset or flame them. If this janna you are talking about would of shield the bruiser and the adc died then they would get flame from the adc. People are just never happy.

If the adc is at 20 hp then janna should shield the adc, but if the adc is at full hp and the mage is at 100 hp, then janna should shield the mage.

Trust me, people can downvote all they want. Im not talking about the right move or the wrong move. Im just answering your question. From a former support main. From experience. it doesnt matter what play they make someone on the team will complain and say it was the wrong play if the fight fails. Which is the main reason i dont even que up for the role anymore.

Depends. If the mage is also OOM, they're basically forced to back anyhow.
Also, depends on your adc. If it's a full-build Jinx or Kog'Maw, they're going to carry the teamfight and the boosts to them are often best.


There's too many varaibles to get into, but it's not ALWAYS shield someone to help them not die.

Sorry, do you become gamebreaking powerfull with the bonus stats from Ardent? No? The ADC does. 
Does the game depend soly on you as soon as the midgame starts? No? It does on the ADC. 

Did Janna get a 56% Winrate by supporting anything but the ADC? No, she didnt.


The only time I support anyone other than my ADC is when my ADC just plain sucks.

The issue with janna is that her Shield also gives good offensive stats. In addition to AD, it can provide life steal and even more damage via Censor to the ranged ADC.

Or it's just a bad and blind support player.

Those are called "Bad players". You wont see those sort of judgement calls from people in lower ELOs, or even often in higher ones. Anything more complex than pushing buttons on the nearest target is beyond most players.

Currently, if your DPS stays alive, you will usually win the fight. Giving the Windspeakers resistances and Ardent Censor buffs to that DPS ensures that.

Can't say I necessarily agree with that, just giving a reasoning.
